mapper.select: SELECT id,name FROM student WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT c.course,s.score from course c left join score s on c.id = s.co_id WHERE s.st_id=#{stId}
SELECT c.id id, c.course course, avg( s.score ) avgSc FROM score s LEFT JOIN course c ON s.co_id = c.id LEFT JOIN student st ON s.st_id = st.id GROUP BY c.id
SELECT st.id id, st.NAME name, avg( s.score ) avgStuSc FROM score s LEFT JOIN course c ON s.co_id = c.id LEFT JOIN student st ON s.st_id = st.id GROUP BY st.id
